snippet: WEINER--Walter. Banker Edmund Safra chose Walter Weiner as chairman of Republic Bank because of his careful judgement and accessibility to all. Walter was filled with optimism and a keen wit. He will never be forgotten by the many he helped. The Ekstract Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEINER--Walter. Banker Edmund Safra chose Walter Weiner as chairman of Republic Bank because of his careful judgement and accessibility to all. Walter was filled with optimism and a keen wit. He will never be forgotten by the many he helped. The Ekstract Family 1/3
